name: Gazer
pages: A Gazer is a medium-sized aberration that spawns in the deep depths of the Underworld or in the Nether. They are the smaller kin of the Beholder.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Rare$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies/Hovers$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 18hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 6hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether

$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Randomly casts one of two spells: $(l:paralysis)Paralysis$(), $(l:harm)Harm$().$(br)- Can randomly summon one minion at a time: $(l:headless)Headless$(), $(l:orc)Orc$(), Zombie, or Vex.
